short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom card deck management for Cards Agains Humanity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A custom card deck management for Cards Agains Humanity, that lets you create presets of multiple card decks and automatically batch-add them to your game, without having to add each deck manually
